text_content: Climate Our climate news coverage consists of the latest startups and investments in solar energy, greentech, renewables, food tech, alternative proteins, as well as circular economy and carbon capture efforts. We also cover research into climate change and how technology can be used to track and mitigate severe weather and climate-related disasters. images.alt: Power lines loom on the horizon at sunset.
The DACLab team stands in front of one of their direct air capture units.

Two vials of oil sit against a leafy backdrop.
Two Tesla Powerwalls sit on the outside of a house.
A thermophotovoltaic cell sits inside Fourth Power's test rig.
A rig drills into the earth against a cloudy sky.
"Subject: Tropical storm in the beach paradise ResortLocation: Playa del Carmen, Riviera Maya, Mexico."
A Quilt heat pump outdoor unit sits outside a white house.

A rendering shows Tesla's Megablock energy storage system.
Pipes are backlit, causing them to appear to glow orange.
The sun rises behind a nuclear power plant cooling tower.
Nuclear fuel rods sit ready for insertion into a reactor.
Natron's Blue Pack sodium-ion battery sits on a table.
